gnu.mapping.Named
public class TelnetRepl
extends gnu.mapping.Procedure0

This is code for running Telnet-based Read-Eval-Print loops. It's based on the code for TelnetRepl

serve

public static Thread serve(gnu.expr.Language language,
                           Socket client)
                    throws IOException
Run a Kawa repl as a telnet server.

Parameters:
client - A client that has connected to us, and that wants to use the telnet protocol to talk to a Scheme read-eval-print-loop.
Throws:
IOException
